text: Evelyn Pacino Sanguinetti (born November 12, 1970) is an American politician. On January 12, 2015, she became the 47th Lieutenant Governor of Illinois. Before being elected alongside Governor Bruce Rauner on November 4, 2014, she served on the Wheaton City Council.Lurz, Nathan - "Wheaton City Council Members Happy for Sanguinetti's Win" . Suburban Life, published November 10, 2014. Retrieved November 16, 2014. On April 22, 2019, Sanguinetti announced her candidacy for the 2020 election in Illinois's 6th congressional district, challenging first-term Democratic incumbent Sean Casten. She dropped out of the race in October 2019. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Lieutenant Governors of Illinois Category:Politicians from Miami Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Wheaton, Illinois
title: Evelyn Sanguinetti
